Class MenuManager

java.lang.Object
  MenuManager

public class MenuManager
extends java.lang.Object

The manager for the main menu at the beginning of the game

Author:
John Kim, Tanner Lai, Raymond Zhao

Constructor Detail

MenuManager

public MenuManager(java.awt.Dimension dim)
This constructor sets up the drawing tool (Graphics2D) and gets the screen dimensions. Other field values are also set.

Parameters:
dim - The dimensions of the screen.
Method Detail

update

public void update()
This method is called every "frame" and sets up what is drawn and controls user interaction with the game itself.

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
This method controls the aspects of the menu's drawings.

keyPressed

public void keyPressed(int key)
This method is called when the user pushes a key down. It sends the key's information to be stored in one of this object's sub classes.

Parameters:
key - The integer id of the key pressed down.

keyReleased

public void keyReleased(int key)
This method is called when the user releases a key. It sends the key's information to be stored in one of this object's sub classes.

Parameters:
key - The integer id of the key released.
